ComicInfo.Penciller: Bernard Baily,Carmine Infantino,Curt Swan,Jim Mooney,Ruben Moreira,Sheldon Moldoff,Bernard Baily,Ruben Moreira,George Roussos
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Man in the Liquid Mask!: Criminal Lorn Logan accidentally breathes some chemical fumes which force him to don an experimental mask to save his life. The mask gives him some surprising new abilities that he uses to commit more crimes, but in doing so he seals his own doom.
We Fought the Giant of Island X: Dr. Edward Darcy is accidentally transformed into a mad giant, and sacrifices his life to save others before a cure can be found.
The Guardian Monster!: Two explorers searching for a buried treasure awaken the monster that has been guarding it.
ComicInfo.Title: The Man in the Liquid Mask!; We Fought the Giant of Island X; The Guardian Monster!
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
